committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill to require that a comprehensive study be prepared regarding the present status of fish and wildlife cancer research at the State and Federal levels, and means for improving and coordinating that research.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to prepare and submit to the Congress a comprehensive study regarding the status of fish and wildlife cancer research at the Federal and State levels and make recommendations regarding the design and funding of an ongoing systematic program, national in scope, for carrying out fish and wildlife cancer research. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to require that a comprehensive study be prepared regarding the present status of fish and wildlife cancer research at the State and Federal levels, and means for improving and coordinating that research.
